problem: 상원 위원회에는 민주당 5명, 공화당 5명, 무소속 1명이 있습니다. 각 당의 모든 위원들이 서로 옆에 앉을 경우, 위원회가 원형 테이블에 둘러앉을 수 있는 방법은 몇 가지입니까? (두 좌석 배치가 서로의 회전 배치인 경우, 동일하게 간주됩니다.)
solution: Choose any seat in which to place the Independent -- it doesn't matter which seat that we choose, since we can rotate the table. Once the Independent's seat has been chosen, either all the Democrats sit to their left and all the Republicans sit to their right, or the other way around. Either way, there are $5!$ ways to put the Democrats in their seats, and $5!$ ways to put the Republicans in their seats. So, the total number of ways to seat the people around the table is $2\cdot5!\cdot5!=2\cdot120\cdot120=\boxed{28800}$.
